phishing_examples.text: URGENT! Aapke account mein suspicious activity hai. Turant password aur OTP share karo.
Aapka bank account block ho jayega agar 24 ghante mein KYC update nahi karte. Link pe click karo: bit.ly/kyc-update
Congratulations! Aapne 50 lakh rupaye ki lottery jeeta hai. Claim karne ke liye processing fee bhejo.
Main SBI bank manager bol raha hoon. Aapke account mein fraud hua hai. Abhi apna CVV aur PIN batao.
Police department se call hai. Aapke naam pe FIR darj hoga agar turant paise transfer nahi karte.
Dear customer, aapka Aadhar number bhejo verification ke liye. Nahi toh account band ho jayega.
Aapke credit card pe 5 lakh ka transaction hua hai. Cancel karne ke liye OTP bhejo turant.
Income tax department se notice. Aapka PAN card number aur bank details share karo immediately.
Aapne iPhone 15 jeeta hai! Claim karne ke liye registration fee GPay pe bhejo: 9876543210
RBI se notice — aapka account freeze ho jayega. Turant verify karo is link pe: tinyurl.com/rbi-verify
CBI officer bol raha hoon. Aapke khilaf warrant issue hua hai. Arrest se bachne ke liye paise transfer karo.
Cyber cell se bol rahe hain. Aapka account hack hua hai. Password share karo reset ke liye.
Last chance! Sirf aaj ke liye bumper offer — free gift milega. Abhi click karo: bit.ly/free-prize
Paytm pe 500 rupaye bhejo token amount. Government scheme ke under 5 lakh milega.
Aapki debit card number aur expiry date bhejo. Bank se verification ho rahi hai.
Jaldi karo! Time expire ho raha hai. Apna OTP de do warna transaction fail ho jayega.
Aapke naam pe legal action hoga. Court case avoid karne ke liye advance payment karo.
Sarkar ki yojana ke tahat 2 lakh ka loan mil raha hai. IFSC code aur account number bhejo.
PhonePe pe 1000 rupaye bhejo. Tax pay karo claim ke liye. Crore rupaye ka prize aapka hai.
expected_threats: tax pay karo claim ke liye

phishing_examples.text: Credit card number dijiye aur CVV batao. Cashback mil raha hai aapke account mein.
Aakhri mauka hai. Form fill karo is link pe aur login details share karo.
Yahan click karo aur apna Aadhaar card details bhejo. KYC expire ho gaya hai aapka.
Customs department se bol rahe hain. Aapka parcel rok diya gaya hai. Fine pay karo.
Jail bhej denge agar cooperation nahi kiya. Account details bhejo turant.
Deadline khatam ho rahi hai KYC ki. PIN number batao verify karne ke liye.

safe_examples.text: Your monthly account statement is ready. Login to view.
Reminder: Your EMI payment of Rs 5000 is due tomorrow.
Thank you for shopping with us. Your order has been dispatched.
Aaj ka weather bahut accha hai. Bahar chalo.
Meeting kal 3 baje hai. Please time pe aana.
Your OTP for login is 483921. Do not share this with anyone.
Kal movie dekhne chalein? Naya movie aaya hai.
Your delivery is scheduled for tomorrow between 10 AM and 2 PM.
Kya haal hai? Bahut din ho gaye baat nahi hui.
